name: cities_states_stateisocode
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool transportistas_de_argentina.
Tool description: Obten las oficinas, localidades y precios de tus envios en Argentina para Andreani, Oca y Correo Argentino.
API description: Fetches the list of cities for a given state's ISO code using the specified RapidAPI key.

stateisocode.description: The ISO code of the state for which the cities need to be retrieved.
